title: New: Stephon Joseph – We Good
body:
Can’t tell you much about **Stephon Joseph** and his first track, _We Good_, aside from that it’s one of the most exciting hip-hop debuts I’ve heard in a long time.

With a flow to rival some of the finest moments on Kanye’s College Dropout (can I say that? too late), it feels completely natural, and chock full of potential. Throw a hook in here and you’ve got a hit. Check it out below.
